leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-晶体/结构生成与逆向设计生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 生成→筛选→验证→多目标优化→闭环
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 生成模型 + 筛选器 + 工作流

unit.unit_name: 多目标/多保真闭环设计

queries: [WEB] active learning for materials discovery github

tools.name: PyMoosh
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical swiss army knife for computing and optimizing optical response of multilayered structures
tools.detailed_description: A tool for computing and optimizing the optical response of multilayered structures, serving as a numerical swiss army knife for optical design and inverse problems.

tools.name: Axelrod
tools.one_line_profile: Research tool for the Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma game theory analysis
tools.detailed_description: A research tool for studying the Iterated Prisoner's Dilemma, widely used in evolutionary biology and social science research to simulate strategies and interactions.

tools.name: SLAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Sequential Learning App for Materials Discovery
tools.detailed_description: A sequential learning application designed for materials discovery, facilitating active learning loops for optimizing material properties.

tools.name: Emukit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for decision making, uncertainty quantification, and multi-fidelity Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: A highly adaptable Python toolkit for enriching decision making with uncertainty quantification, specifically supporting multi-fidelity modeling and Bayesian optimization.

tools.name: PROPTI
tools.one_line_profile: Interface tool for inverse material parameter estimation coupling simulation models
tools.detailed_description: An interface tool that couples simulation models with optimization algorithms to solve the inverse problem of material parameter estimation, particularly in fire dynamics.

tools.name: Basic-Database-On-LBT
tools.one_line_profile: Reusable parameter database for Ladybug Tools environmental simulations
tools.detailed_description: A database repository storing reusable parameter information for Ladybug, Honeybee, and Dragonfly tools, supporting environmental and building physics simulations.

tools.name: FidelityFusion
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fidelity fusion toolbox with Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox designed for multi-fidelity data fusion and Bayesian optimization, enabling efficient scientific modeling and design optimization.

tools.name: mfpml
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fidelity probabilistic machine learning library
tools.detailed_description: A library for multi-fidelity probabilistic machine learning, providing methods for efficient modeling and uncertainty quantification in scientific problems.

tools.name: libEnsemble
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolkit for coordinating asynchronous and dynamic ensembles of calculations
tools.detailed_description: A library to coordinate the concurrent evaluation of dynamic ensembles of calculations. It is designed for massive scaling and is widely used in scientific computing for design, decision making, and inference workflows.

tools.name: SPINNER
tools.one_line_profile: Structure Prediction of Inorganic crystals using Neural Network potentials with Evolutionary and Random searches
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting the structures of inorganic crystals by combining neural network potentials with evolutionary and random search algorithms.

tools.name: pymoog
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the MOOG spectral synthesis code
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for MOOG, a code that performs spectral synthesis for astrophysics. It facilitates the usage of MOOG for stellar abundance analysis.

tools.name: MDN-GAN
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse Modeling in Microstructural Materials Design using GANs and MDNs
tools.detailed_description: A framework combining Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) and Mixture Density Networks (MDNs) for inverse modeling tasks in microstructural materials design.

tools.name: GaBOtorch
tools.one_line_profile: Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization on Riemannian manifolds
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing Geometry-aware Bayesian Optimization (GaBO) on Riemannian manifolds, useful for optimization problems with geometric constraints.

tools.name: EMSeek
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous Agentic Platform for Electron Microscopy and Materials Analysis
tools.detailed_description: A platform bridging electron microscopy and materials analysis with autonomous agents to automate and optimize experimental workflows.

tools.name: MOMFBO-Algorithm
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective Multi-fidelity acquisition function for Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a Multi-objective Multi-fidelity acquisition function for Bayesian optimization based on the Expected Hypervolume Improvement (EHVI) method.

tools.name: Bayesian-Optimization-for-Unity
tools.one_line_profile: Unity asset for Bayesian optimization via BoTorch
tools.detailed_description: A tool that integrates Bayesian optimization (using BoTorch) into the Unity engine, enabling human-in-the-loop design optimization workflows.

tools.name: MFBO_Falsification
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fidelity Bayesian optimization for falsification of control systems
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Multi-fidelity Bayesian optimization specifically designed for the falsification of learning-based control systems.

tools.name: CAMD
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-based sequential learning software for materials discovery
tools.detailed_description: A framework for sequential learning and autonomous discovery in materials science, facilitating the design of closed-loop research campaigns.

tools.name: protosearch
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning for materials from DFT and prototypes
tools.detailed_description: Software for active learning of new materials using Density Functional Theory (DFT) and crystal structure prototypes to predict stable structures.

tools.name: ALLM
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning for Accelerated Design of Layered Materials
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing active learning strategies specifically for the accelerated design and discovery of layered materials.

tools.name: camd-eia-crosswalk
tools.one_line_profile: Data integration tool for US power sector emissions
tools.detailed_description: A data processing utility to integrate and cross-reference U.S. power sector emission and operation data between EPA and EIA databases.

tools.name: nextorch
tools.one_line_profile: Experimental design and Bayesian optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for experimental design and Bayesian optimization, facilitating automated chemical and materials experimentation.

tools.name: WISDEM-Ard
tools.one_line_profile: Wind farm optimization suite
tools.detailed_description: A modular, gradient-enabled multi-disciplinary and multi-fidelity optimization suite for wind energy and wind farm design.

tools.name: Chemeleon-Zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI models for materials design
tools.detailed_description: A collection of generative AI models specifically tailored for materials design and discovery tasks.

tools.name: IM2ODE
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse Design of Materials by Multi-objective Differential Evolution
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the inverse design of materials using multi-objective differential evolution algorithms.

tools.name: MatAgent
tools.one_line_profile: Physics-aware multi-agent LLM framework for materials
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing physics-aware multi-agent Large Language Models to accelerate materials science discovery and optimization.

tools.name: ProtTrans
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained language models for proteins
tools.detailed_description: State-of-the-art pretrained transformer models for protein sequence analysis and embedding generation.

tools.name: vsi2tif
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for cellSens VSI to pyramidal TIFF
tools.detailed_description: A tool for converting Whole Slide Images (WSI) from the proprietary cellSens VSI format to standard pyramidal TIFF format for bio-imaging analysis.

tools.name: CAMDA-DILI
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of Drug-Induced Liver Injury
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the prediction and mechanistic analysis of Drug-Induced Liver Injury (DILI) based on chemical structures.

tools.name: pymoo
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective optimization framework
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for multi-objective optimization, offering state-of-the-art algorithms like NSGA-II, NSGA-III, and MOEA/D, widely used in scientific engineering design.

tools.name: BO_of_COFs
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization of Nanoporous Materials
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for Bayesian Optimization applied to the discovery and design of Covalent Organic Frameworks (COFs) and nanoporous materials.

tools.name: ADAPT
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse parameter identification for material models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for inverse parameter identification of constitutive material models using mathematical optimization, compatible with finite element simulations.

tools.name: Olympus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for noisy optimization
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework designed for noisy optimization and experiment planning tasks in materials science and chemistry.

tools.name: atomgpt
tools.one_line_profile: Generative Pretrained Transformer for Materials
tools.detailed_description: Generative Pretrained Transformer (GPT) models specifically trained for materials design and property prediction tasks.

tools.name: TwinGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed simulation orchestration framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework for distributed container orchestration to support high-throughput simulations, simulation-driven optimization, and Digital Twins.

tools.name: KGB-DMOEA
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Knowledge Guided Bayesian Dynamic Multi-Objective Evolutionary Algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Knowledge Guided Bayesian Dynamic Multi-Objective Evolutionary Algorithm (KGB-DMOEA), designed for solving dynamic multi-objective optimization problems.

tools.name: gest-api
tools.one_line_profile: Standardization API for generator algorithms in scientific optimization workflows
tools.detailed_description: Provides a standardized interface for generator algorithms used in scientific optimization frameworks such as optimas, Xopt, and libEnsemble, facilitating interoperability in physics and engineering simulations.

tools.name: oiffile
tools.one_line_profile: Reader for Olympus Image Format (OIF/OIB) microscopy files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to read Olympus image files (OIF and OIB), commonly used in biological and materials microscopy, enabling scientific image analysis and processing.

tools.name: PyMOOSE
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for MOOSE PorousFlow simulations
tools.detailed_description: Serves as a python interface to write and run input files for MOOSE (Multiphysics Object-Oriented Simulation Environment) PorousFlow simulations, facilitating porous media modeling.

tools.name: DeepHyper
tools.one_line_profile: Massively parallel hyperparameter optimization and neural architecture search
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for scalable asynchronous hyperparameter optimization (HPO) and neural architecture search (NAS), specifically designed for scientific machine learning (SciML) applications on high-performance computing systems.

tools.name: axtreme
tools.one_line_profile: Extensions for Ax and BoTorch for reliability and probabilistic design
tools.detailed_description: Development repository for the RaPiD project providing extensions to Ax and BoTorch libraries, focusing on reliability analysis and probabilistic design optimization.

tools.name: Dragonfly
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Bayesian optimization for high-dimensional problems
tools.detailed_description: An open source Python library for scalable Bayesian optimization, designed to handle high-dimensional parameter spaces and multi-fidelity data sources, suitable for scientific experiment design and model tuning.

tools.name: Ax
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive experimentation platform for optimizing black-box functions
tools.detailed_description: Ax is an accessible, general-purpose platform for understanding, managing, exploring, and optimizing adaptive experiments. It is widely used in materials science for closed-loop optimization and Bayesian optimization tasks.

tools.name: AEPsych
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive experimentation framework for psychophysics and perception research
tools.detailed_description: AEPsych is a framework for adaptive experimentation in psychophysics, built on top of BoTorch and Ax. It enables efficient estimation of psychometric thresholds and functions using Gaussian Processes.

tools.name: rocketsled
tools.one_line_profile: Black box optimization framework for high-throughput computing workflows
tools.detailed_description: Rocketsled is a plug-and-play black box optimization framework designed for high-throughput computing (HTC) environments. It integrates with FireWorks to enable adaptive workflows for materials discovery and design.

tools.name: MatAgent
tools.one_line_profile: Generative framework for interpretable inorganic materials design using LLMs and diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: MatAgent is a generative framework designed for the inverse design of inorganic materials. It integrates diffusion-based generation, property prediction, and Large Language Model (LLM) driven reasoning to create interpretable and targeted material structures.

tools.name: VideoMetamaterials
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse design of nonlinear mechanical metamaterials via video denoising diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a video denoising diffusion model framework for the inverse design of nonlinear mechanical metamaterials. It leverages video generation techniques to predict and design dynamic material behaviors.

tools.name: swat-pytools
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for executing and calibrating the Soil and Water Assessment Tool (SWAT)
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper designed to facilitate the execution and calibration of the Soil and Water Assessment Tool (SWAT) on Unix/macOS systems. It aids in hydrological modeling and environmental assessment tasks.

tools.name: MatDesINNe
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse materials design via invertible neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A framework for inverse materials design utilizing Invertible Neural Networks (INNs). It enables the generation of material structures that satisfy specific target properties by inverting the structure-property relationship.

tools.name: imatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Image-based generative model for inverse design of solid state materials
tools.detailed_description: An image-based generative model framework for the inverse design of solid-state materials. It treats material structures as images to leverage generative computer vision techniques for discovering new materials.

tools.name: dragonfly-legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale climate and urban heat island modeling plugin
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for large-scale climate analysis and urban heat island modeling. It is part of the Ladybug Tools ecosystem, designed to simulate and analyze environmental factors in urban planning and building physics.

tools.name: PyEPAL
tools.one_line_profile: Multiobjective active learning with tunable accuracy/efficiency tradeoff
tools.detailed_description: PyEPAL (Pareto Active Learning) is a Python library for multiobjective active learning. It is designed to optimize the tradeoff between accuracy and efficiency in experimental design and materials discovery loops, providing clear stopping criteria.

tools.name: HierarchicalDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Computational building block approach for multiscale architected materials design
tools.detailed_description: A computational framework for the analysis and design of multiscale architected materials, specifically hierarchical metal metamaterials. It employs a building block approach to model complex material structures.

tools.name: DPL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fidelity hyperparameter optimization with deep power laws
tools.detailed_description: A multi-fidelity hyperparameter optimization tool that uses deep power laws to achieve state-of-the-art results. While general-purpose, it addresses the multi-fidelity optimization problem central to efficient scientific simulation and design loops.

tools.name: pymoogi
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for MOOG spectral synthesis code
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper for MOOG, a code used for spectral synthesis in astrophysics. It handles plotting and interfacing with the underlying Fortran code for stellar abundance analysis.

tools.name: Boa
tools.one_line_profile: High-level Bayesian optimization framework wrapping Ax and BoTorch
tools.detailed_description: Bayesian Optimization for Anything (Boa) is a high-level framework that wraps Ax and BoTorch to facilitate easy implementation of Bayesian optimization loops. It is designed to be accessible for various optimization tasks, including scientific experimentation.

tools.name: SAP2000-python-optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Structural optimization using SAP2000 and genetic algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for structural optimization that interfaces with the SAP2000 finite element software via its OAPI. It utilizes genetic algorithms (pymoo) to optimize structural designs, suitable for civil and mechanical engineering research.

tools.name: dZiner
tools.one_line_profile: Chemist AI Agent for Rational Inverse Design of Materials
tools.detailed_description: dZiner is an AI agent designed to assist chemists in the rational inverse design of materials. It likely employs machine learning techniques to suggest material candidates that meet specific property criteria.

tools.name: BoTorch
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization library in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: BoTorch is a library for Bayesian Optimization built on PyTorch. It provides a modular and easily extensible interface for creating Bayesian optimization loops, widely used in scientific experimentation and materials design (M4-04).

tools.name: MatterGen
tools.one_line_profile: Generative model for inorganic materials design across the periodic table
tools.detailed_description: MatterGen is a generative model designed for the creation of inorganic materials. It allows for fine-tuning to steer generation towards specific property constraints, enabling inverse design of crystal structures with desired characteristics.

tools.name: pymoode
tools.one_line_profile: Differential Evolution optimization framework extending pymoo
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework for Differential Evolution (DE) built on top of the pymoo library. It provides tools for multi-objective optimization, suitable for engineering and scientific design problems involving complex constraints.

tools.name: Optimas
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable optimization framework powered by libEnsemble
tools.detailed_description: Optimas is an optimization framework designed for high-performance computing (HPC) environments. It leverages libEnsemble to coordinate large-scale optimization tasks, making it suitable for complex scientific simulations and design loops.

tools.name: Dragonflye
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: Dragonflye is a bioinformatics pipeline specifically designed to assemble bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore sequencing data. It integrates various tools to automate the assembly process.

tools.name: MatInvent
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse materials design using generative diffusion models and RL
tools.detailed_description: MatInvent is a tool for accelerating inverse materials design. It combines generative diffusion models with reinforcement learning to explore chemical space and propose novel material structures with targeted properties.

tools.name: BioDiscoveryAgent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based agent for closed-loop design of genetic perturbation experiments
tools.detailed_description: BioDiscoveryAgent utilizes Large Language Models (LLMs) to act as an autonomous agent for designing genetic perturbation experiments. It operates in a closed-loop manner to optimize experimental parameters for biological discovery.

tools.name: Summit
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning framework for optimizing chemical reactions
tools.detailed_description: Summit is a package for optimizing chemical reactions using machine learning. It provides a suite of tools for reaction optimization, including Bayesian optimization and other strategies to automate and improve chemical synthesis processes.

tools.name: XtalOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Evolutionary algorithm for crystal structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: XtalOpt is a free and open-source evolutionary algorithm designed for crystal structure prediction. It is implemented as an extension to the Avogadro molecular editor and allows for multi-objective optimization of crystal structures based on various criteria.
